text: Lech Ordon (24 November 1928 – 21 October 2017) was a Polish actor. In 1948, he graduated from The Aleksander Zelwerowicz National Academy of Dramatic Art in Warsaw, at the time located in Łódź. He was born in Poznań. He was known for his roles in Letters to Santa, Der Schimmelreiter, Czterdziestolatek and in Mister Blot's Academy. In December 2008, he was awarded the Medal for Merit to Culture – Gloria Artis. He died on 21 October 2017 in Warsaw from pneumonia complicated by a stroke at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Infectious disease deaths in Poland Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Actors from Poznań
